title: Alex Carpenter
description: I’m a front-end developer who is passionate about building inclusive web experiences. Currently I’m teaching what I know about HTML, CSS, & JavaScript on YouTube.

projects.title: butane-toasts
projects.description: A small library for creating toast messages.

projects.description: An opinionated boilerplate for new projects built with Eleventy.

interviews.title: Show Me Your Mic
interviews.description: Joined Chris Enns to talk about how I started the I Brew My Own Coffee Podcast, and the tools used to create the show.

interviews.title: How to Hold a Pencil
interviews.description: Reuben Ingber invited me to join him on his podcast Hold to Hold a Pencil to talk about my start in web development industry and being self-taught.

interviews.title: Statamic Series
